context.title: Standard Breakpoint Editor
context.description: This editor allows you to change standard attributes on a given breakpoint, such as the hit count and suspend policy

context.title: Breakpoint Properties
context.description: The breakpoint property pages allow you to change the settings for each different kind of breakpoint.

context.title: Connect Tab
context.description: This tab allows you to specify the way you want to connect to a remote server to debug JavaScript.

context.title: Editor Toggle Breakpoint
context.description: This action allows you to quickly toggle a breakpoint at the selected location in the editor

context.title: Breakpoint Properties Action
context.description: This action allows quick access to the properties for the selected breakpoint

context.title: Breakpoint Hit Count Action
context.description: This action allows you to quickly add or change the hit count of the selected breakpoint (if it supports having a hit count)

context.title: Suspend Policy Action
context.description: This action allows a quick way to toggle the suspend policy for the selected breakpoint

context.title: Toggle Function Breakpoint
context.description: This action allows a quick way to toggle a function breakpoint from a selected function in the Outline View

context.title: Function Exit Action
context.description: This action allows a quick way to toggle if the selected function breakpoint will suspend when the function exits

context.title: Function Entry Action
context.description: This action allows a quick way to toggle if the selected function breakpoint will suspend when a function is entered

context.title: Add Script Load Breakpoint
context.description: This action allows you to create a new script load breakpoint

context.title: Suspend For All Script Loads
context.description: This action allows you to toggle if the debugger should suspend for all script loads or not
This action allows quick access to the properties of the breakpoint without having to open the Breakpoints View
This action allows quick access to enabling or disabling a breakpoint without having to open the Breakpoints View
This action allows you to quickly open (or reopen) the source for a loaded script without having to find it in your workspace.
The Show 'this' variable action allows you to show or hide the 'this' varibale from the Variables view
The Show function variables action allows you to show or hide function variables from the Variables view
The Show proto variables action allows you to show or hide [proto] variables from the Variables view
The Evaluate action allows you to quickly evaluate the currently selected text in the JavaScript editor
The Evaluate command allows you to quickly evaluate the currently selected text in the JavaScript editor
The Debug preference page allows you to quickly set global settings for JavaScript debugging
